He treats his wife like a slave. 他把妻子当作奴隶看待。 4. Beginning in1970, she spent more time sweeping Harry off his feet than she did in her real estate career. He divorced his wife o

entry.def: A man's wife is the woman he is married to.

example.ex: He married his wife Jane 37 years ago...
The woman was the wife of a film director.
example.tran: 这个女人是一个电影导演的妻子。

Sentence.sentence: I did all the cooking myself and my wife waited on tables.
Social workers discover that the wife normally tries to take care of her husband herself for as long as she can in order not to use up their life savings
He and his wife did everything by themselves.
What do we learn about the man's wife from the conversation?

If you tell an acquaintance you are a grandfather who recently lost his wife and who does volunteer work on weekends, several elements of your self-image are bought to light — the roles of grandparent, widower and conscientious citizen

means.word_mean: 妻子；太太；夫人；已婚妇女

sentences.en: Some people think that husband and wife should never work together.
sentences.cn: 有人认为夫妻二人绝不应该在一起工作。

sentences.en: The two men went fishing while their wives prepared the dinner.
sentences.cn: 那两个男人去钓鱼时, 他们的妻子做晚饭。

jushi.english: He married a wife by whom he had two daughters.
jushi.chinese: 他娶了妻并和她生了两个女儿。

jushi.english: My wife will witness that I was at home all night.
jushi.chinese: 我妻子会证明那天我整夜都在家。

jushi.english: I want you for my wife, will you marry me?
jushi.chinese: 我希望你做我的妻子,你愿意同我结婚吗?
